data.eml:eml: Catapterixtianshanica sp. n. - the second species of the genus from the Palaearctic Region (Lepidoptera, Acanthopteroctetidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mey, Wolfram, Rutjan, Evgeniy (2016): Catapterixtianshanica sp. n. - the second species of the genus from the Palaearctic Region (Lepidoptera, Acanthopteroctetidae). Nota Lepidopterologica 39 (2): 145-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.39.9882, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.39.9882
